fields.name: When will Virtual Console games be supported?
fields.value:
**For PKSM**: Nobody on the FlagBrew team is interested in working on gen 1/2 support. However, if you would like to work on it yourself, and the code is up to our standards, we will merge a PR. Please see [this issue](https://github.com/FlagBrew/PKSM/issues/1181) for more info.
**For Checkpoint**: NES, SNES, GB, and GBC are supported. However, GBA is not currently supported. You can back up your GBA saves using [GodMode9](https://3ds.hacks.guide/dumping-titles-and-game-cartridges#backup-gba-vc-saves).

fields.name: Why do I have to wait so long for new releases?
fields.value: Because you think you're entitled to everything.

fields.name: I have Homebrew/*hax. Why can't I launch any Flagbrew apps?
fields.value: All FlagBrew apps *require* CFW to function. **There is no viable reason to not install CFW nowadays, as there is a free method.** You can follow [this guide](https://3ds.hacks.guide) to install CFW on your 3ds. ***Versions under PKSM 10.0 are not supported and no assistance will be given with them!!!***

footer.text: Please note: DMing users asking how to access the assistance channels will lead to you receiving two warns.

fields.name: I can't access any of the channels in the Community group!
fields.value: You need to toggle either the `3ds Updates` or `Switch Updates` roles to access these channels. Information on how to toggle these can be found in <#278223623175798794>.
